    • GraphicalView

      public GraphicalView​(Map map, Mission mission, Window window)
      Constructor of object GraphicalView using the map, mission and the window
      Parameters:
      map - the map whose informations are filled that will be painted
      mission - the mission whose informations are filled that will be painted
      window - the window where the GraphicalView will be on
